author: Cyrus Farivar and Chiara Sottile
title: Firefighters fear coronavirus-fueled supply shortages soon
description: At the current rate, many fire departments will run out of personal protective equipment, like gowns and N95 masks, in weeks.
content:
OAKLAND, Calif. For more than two weeks now, the Oakland Fire Department has had a new approach if it needs to send someone inside a home.
Instead of all four firefighters from its rig, just one firefighter in latex gloves, a respirator mask and a surgical g… [+5282 chars]
